name: Illuga
title: Nightmare's Burning Heart
description: Member of the investigation squad, the Nightmare Orioles. The youngest squad leader among the Lightkeepers.

normal.1: Performs up to 4 consecutive spear strikes.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Summons the trusty messenger bird, "Aedon." Different effects are produced depending on whether the skill is Tapped or Held.
description.3: Aedon dashes towards enemies in front, dealing <geo>Geo DMG</geo> to enemies it comes into contact with.
description.6: Enter aiming mode, and command Aedon to dash towards opponents being aimed at, dealing <geo>Geo DMG</geo> to opponents it comes into contact with.

description.0: Light the lamp, dealing AoE Geo DMG, and gain Haunted Night's Oriole-Song effect for 20s. When this effect is active, Illuga gains 21 stacks of Nightingale's Song. When Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts of nearby active party members deal Geo DMG to opponents, 1 stack of Nightingale's Song is consumed to increase the DMG dealt. Increase in DMG is based on Illuga's Elemental Mastery. If DMG is inflicted by Lunar-Crystallize, DMG dealt will increase further.
description.1: When <geo>Geo DMG</geo> dealt in this manner hits multiple opponents, multiple stacks of Nightingale's Song will be consumed, depending on how many opponents are hit.
description.3: Additionally, if there are <geo>Geo Constructs</geo> created by nearby party members on the battlefield while Illuga unleashes his Elemental Burst, or when nearby party members create <geo>Geo Constructs</geo> while Haunted Night's Oriole-Song is active, every <geo>Geo Construct</geo> on the battlefield will allow Illuga to gain 5 additional stacks of Nightingale's Song. Within 20s after unleashing his Elemental Burst, Illuga can gain a maximum of 15 additional stacks of Nightingale's Song this way.
description.5: When all stacks of Nightingale's Song have been consumed, or when the state's duration ends, the Haunted Night's Oriole-Song effect will end.

skillParams.3: Nightingale's Song Stacks Gained from Elemental Burst
skillParams.4: Nightingale's Song Stacks Gained from Geo Constructs

description.0: After unleashing Elemental Skill Dawnbearing Songbird or Elemental Burst Shadowless Reflection, other nearby party members will gain the Lightkeeper's Oath effect for 20s: For Geo DMG dealt to opponents, CRIT Rate increases by 5% and CRIT DMG increases by 10%.
description.3: Party members affected by the Lightkeeper's Oath effect have their Elemental Mastery increased by 50.

description.0: Nightingale's Song's effects are enhanced: When there are 1/2/3 Hydro or Geo characters in the party, Nightingale's Song will further increase DMG. Increase in DMG is equal to 7%/14%/24% of Illuga's Elemental Mastery. If this aforementioned DMG is inflicted by a Lunar-Crystallize reaction, increase in DMG is equal to 48%/96%/160% of Illuga's Elemental Mastery.
When Illuga is in the party, the party's Moonsign will increase by 1 level.
At night (18:00 â€“ 06:00), your party members gain the Swift Stride effect: Movement SPD increased by 10%.
description.1: Does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or Spiral Abyss. Swift Stride does not stack.
description.2: Additionally, Illuga appears to be able to decipher the whispers of the Wild Hunt...

description.0: After Illuga triggers a <geo>Geo-related Reaction</geo> on the field, he will regain 12 Elemental Energy. This effect can be triggered at most once every 15s.

When Elemental Burst Shadowless Reflection's Haunted Night's Oriole-Song effect is active, for every 7 stacks of Nightingale's Song consumed, Illuga will summon Aedon, dealing a single instance of Geo DMG to 1 nearby opponent. The DMG dealt is based on 400% of Illuga's Elemental Mastery and 200% of his DEF. This DMG is considered Elemental Burst DMG.
Increases the Level of Elemental Burst Shadowless Reflection by 3.
When Elemental Burst Shadowless Reflection's Haunted Night's Oriole-Song effect is active, nearby active party members will have their DEF increased by 200.
Increases the Level of Elemental Skill Dawnbearing Songbird by 3.
Enhances the Lightkeeper's Oath effect of the Ascension Talent Torchforger's Covenant: For Geo DMG dealt to opponents, CRIT Rate is increased by 10%, CRIT DMG is increased by 30%.
description.3: When characters are affected by Lightkeeper's Oath, Elemental Mastery is increased by 80.
description.4: You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Torchforger's Covenant."
